portfolio.name: Interactive Venue Maps
portfolio.description: Find the best seats in the house for thousands of popular venues. Narrow your search by selecting sections or simply zoom in to filter tickets to visible rows.

portfolio.name: Fanxchange.com
portfolio.description: Consumer site for Fanxchange's live-event marketplace.

openSource.name: SVGEO
openSource.description: NodeJS library/CLI for converting SVG files to GeoJSON.

experiments.name: Geometry Slicer
experiments.description: Bisect complex 3D models in real-time with this UnityEngine component.

experiments.name: Geometry Stretcher
experiments.description: Stretch 3D geometries as if they were rubber.

experiments.name: Perlin Planet
experiments.description: Procedural planet generatation using 3D Perlin Noise.

experiments.name: Giant's Causeway
experiments.description: Procedural hexagonal terrain inspired by the Giant's Causeway in Northern Ireland. Terrain is composed of an array of basalt-like columns which shift vertically to represent a translating terrain.
